org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm
Class Alarm

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.alarm.Alarm
Direct Known Subclasses:
FailedEraseAlarm, FailedKillAlarm, FailedLockAlarm, FailedMemReadAlarm, FailedWriteAlarm, FreeMemoryAlarm, TTOperStatusAlarm
public class Alarm
extends java.lang.Object

Alarm is the base of all the classes within the object model that define the contents of alarm messages.

Field Summary
protected  AlarmLevel alarmLevel
          Indicates the severity level assigned to this alarm.
protected  java.lang.String name
          The name of the Alarm object identifying the type of alarm, e.g., "FreeMemoryAlarm", "TagListFullAlarm", "ReadPointOperStatusAlarm".
protected  java.lang.String readerDeviceEPC
          The epc attribute of the reader that generated the alarm.
protected  int readerDeviceHandle
          The handle attribute of the reader that generated the alarm.
protected  java.lang.String readerDeviceName
          The name of the reader that generated the alarm.
protected  java.lang.String readerDeviceRole
          The role attribute of the reader that generated the alarm.
protected  int suppressCount
          Indicates the number of times the generation of this alarm has been suppressed.
protected  long timeTicks
          The return value of the ReaderDevice's getTimeTicks() method at the time the Alarm was generated.
protected  java.util.Date timeUTC
          The return value of the ReaderDevice's getTimeUTC() method at the time the Alarm was generated.
 
Constructor Summary
protected Alarm(java.lang.String name, AlarmLevel alarmLevel, ReaderDevice readerDevice)
          Protected constructor.

          Returns the severity level assigned to this alarm.

          Returns the name of the Alarm object identifying the type of alarm, e.g., "FreeMemoryAlarm", "TagListFullAlarm", "ReadPointOperStatusAlarm".

          Returns the epc attribute of the reader that generated the alarm.

 java.lang.String getReaderDeviceRole()
          Returns the role attribute of the reader that generated the alarm.
 int getSuppressCount()
          Returns the number of times the generation of this alarm has been suppressed.
 long getTimeTicks()
          Returns the return value of the ReaderDevice's getTimeTicks() method at the time the Alarm was generated.
 java.util.Date getTimeUTC()
          Returns the return value of the ReaderDevice's getTimeUTC() method at the time the Alarm was generated.
 void suppress()
          Increases the number of times the generation of this alarm has been suppressed by 1.

name

protected java.lang.String name
The name of the Alarm object identifying the type of alarm, e.g., "FreeMemoryAlarm", "TagListFullAlarm", "ReadPointOperStatusAlarm".

alarmLevel

protected AlarmLevel alarmLevel
Indicates the severity level assigned to this alarm.

suppressCount

protected int suppressCount
Indicates the number of times the generation of this alarm has been suppressed. It is reset to 0 after the alarm is generated.
